00043    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00044    /* 
00045    * Constructor.
00046    */
00047    MdSimulation::MdSimulation(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00048     : Simulation(communicator),
00049       system_(),
00050       mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_(0),
00051       isInitialized_(false),
00052       isRestarting_(false)
00053    {
00054       system_.setId(0);
00055       system_.setSimulation(*this);
00056       system_.setFileMaster(fileMaster());
00057       mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_ = new MdDiagnosticManager(*this);
00058       assert(mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00059       setDiagnosticManager(mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00060    }
00061    #endif
00062 
00063    /* 
00064    * Constructor.
00065    */
00066    MdSimulation::MdSimulation()
00067     : Simulation(),
00068       system_(),
00069       mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_(0),
00070       isInitialized_(false),
00071       isRestarting_(false)
00072    {
00073       system_.setId(0);
00074       system_.setSimulation(*this);
00075       system_.setFileMaster(fileMaster());
00076       mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_ = new MdDiagnosticManager(*this);
00077       assert(mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00078       setDiagnosticManager(mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00079    }
00080 
00081    /* 
00082    * Destructor.
00083    */
00084    MdSimulation::~MdSimulation()
00085    {
00086       assert(mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00087       if (mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_) {
00088          delete mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_;
00089          mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_ = 0;
00090       }
00091    }

00093    /*
00094    * Process command line options.
00095    */
00096    void MdSimulation::setOptions(int argc, char **argv)
00097    {
00098       char* rarg   = 0;
00099       bool  eflag  = false;
00100       bool  rflag  = false;
00101       #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00102       bool  pflag = false;
00103       #endif
00104    
00105       // Read program arguments
00106       int c;
00107       opterr = 0;
00108       while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "epr:")) != -1) {
00109          switch (c) {
00110          case 'e':
00111            eflag = true;
00112            break;
00113          case 'r':
00114            rflag = true;
00115            rarg  = optarg;
00116            break;
00117          #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00118          case 'p':
00119            pflag = true;
00120            break;
00121          #endif
00122          case '?':
00123            std::cout << "Unknown option -" << optopt << std::endl;
00124            UTIL_THROW("Invalid command line option");
00125          }
00126       }
00127    
00128       // Set flag to echo parameters as they are read.
00129       if (eflag) {
00130          Util::ParamComponent::setEcho(true);
00131       }
00132       #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00133       // Set to use a perturbation.
00134       if (pflag) {
00135    
00136          // Set to expect perturbation in the param file.
00137          system().setExpectPerturbation();
00138    
00139          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00140          Util::Log::file() << "Set to read parameters from a single file" 
00141                            << std::endl;
00142          setParamCommunicator();
00143          #endif
00144    
00145       }
00146       #endif
00147       if (rflag) {
00148          std::cout << "Reading restart" << std::endl;
00149          std::cout << "Base file name " << std::string(rarg) << std::endl;
00150          isRestarting_ = true; 
00151          readRestart(std::string(rarg));
00152       }
00153    }
00154 
00155    /* 
00156    * Read parameters from file.
00157    */
00158    void MdSimulation::readParam(std::istream &in)
00159    { 
00160       if (isRestarting_) {
00161          if (isInitialized_) {
00162             return;
00163          }
00164       } else 
00165       if (isInitialized_) {
00166          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readParam when already initialized");
00167       }
00168 
00169       readBegin(in, "MdSimulation");
00170 
00171       Simulation::readParam(in); 
00172 
00173       readParamComposite(in, system_); 
00174       readParamComposite(in, diagnosticManager());
00175 
00176       isValid();
00177       isInitialized_ = true;
00178       readEnd(in);
00179    }
00180  
00181    /*
00182    * Read default parameter file.
00183    */
00184    void MdSimulation::readParam()
00185    {  readParam(fileMaster().paramFile()); }

00188    /*
00189    * Read and implement commands in an input script.
00190    */
00191    void MdSimulation::readCommands(std::istream &in)
00192    {
00193       std::string   command;
00194       std::string   filename;
00195       std::ifstream inputFile;
00196       std::ofstream outputFile;
00197 
00198       #ifndef UTIL_MPI
00199       std::istream&     inBuffer = in;
00200       #else
00201       std::stringstream inBuffer;
00202       std::string       line;
00203       #endif
00204 
00205       bool readNext = true;
00206       while (readNext) {
00207 
00208          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00209          if (!hasParamCommunicator() || isParamIoProcessor()) {
00210             getNextLine(in, line);
00211          } 
00212          if (hasParamCommunicator()) {
00213             bcast<std::string>(communicator(), line, 0);
00214          }
00215          inBuffer.clear();
00216          for (unsigned i=0; i < line.size(); ++i) {
00217             inBuffer.put(line[i]);
00218          }
00219          #endif
00220 
00221          inBuffer >> command;
00222          Log::file().setf(std::ios_base::left);
00223          Log::file().width(15);
00224          Log::file() << command;
00225 
00226          if (isRestarting_) {
00227 
00228             if (command == "RESTART") {
00229                int endStep;
00230                inBuffer >> endStep;
00231                Log::file() << "  " << iStep_ << " to " 
00232                            << endStep << std::endl;
00233                simulate(endStep, isRestarting_);
00234                isRestarting_ = false;
00235             } else {
00236                UTIL_THROW("Missing RESTART command");
00237             }
00238 
00239          } else {
00240 
00241             if (command == "FINISH") {
00242                Log::file() << std::endl;
00243                readNext = false;
00244             } else 
00245             if (command == "READ_CONFIG") {
00246                inBuffer >> filename;
00247                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00248                fileMaster().openInputFile(filename, inputFile);
00249                system().readConfig(inputFile);
00250                inputFile.close();
00251             } else
00252             if (command == "THERMALIZE") {
00253                double temperature;
00254                inBuffer >> temperature;
00255                Log::file() << Dbl(temperature, 15, 6) << std::endl;
00256                system().setBoltzmannVelocities(temperature);
00257                system().removeDriftVelocity();
00258             } else
00259             if (command == "SIMULATE") {
00260                int endStep;
00261                inBuffer >> endStep;
00262                Log::file() << Int(endStep, 15) << std::endl;
00263                bool isContinuation = false;
00264                simulate(endStep, isContinuation);
00265             } else
00266             if (command == "CONTINUE") {
00267                if (iStep_ == 0) {
00268                   UTIL_THROW("Attempt to continue simulation when iStep_ == 0");
00269                }
00270                int endStep;
00271                inBuffer >> endStep;
00272                Log::file() << Int(endStep, 15) << std::endl;
00273                bool isContinuation = true;
00274                simulate(endStep, isContinuation);
00275             } else
00276             if (command == "ANALYZE_DUMPS") {
00277                int min, max;
00278                inBuffer >> min >> max >> filename;
00279                Log::file() <<  Int(min, 15) << Int(max, 15)
00280                            <<  Str(filename, 20) << std::endl;
00281                analyzeDumps(min, max, filename);
00282             } else
00283             if (command == "WRITE_CONFIG") {
00284                inBuffer >> filename;
00285                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00286                fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile);
00287                system().writeConfig(outputFile);
00288                outputFile.close();
00289             } else
00290             if (command == "WRITE_PARAM") {
00291                inBuffer >> filename;
00292                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00293                fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile);
00294                writeParam(outputFile);
00295                outputFile.close();
00296             } else
00297             if (command == "SET_CONFIG_IO") {
00298                std::string classname;
00299                inBuffer >> classname;
00300                Log::file() << Str(classname, 15) << std::endl;
00301                system().setConfigIo(classname);
00302             } else
00303             if (command == "ANALYZE_TRAJECTORY") {
00304                std::string classname;
00305                std::string filename;
00306                int min, max;
00307                inBuffer >> min >> max >> classname >> filename;
00308                Log::file() << " " << Str(classname,15) 
00309                            << " " << Str(filename, 15)
00310                            << std::endl;
00311                analyzeTrajectory(min, max, classname,filename);
00312             } else 
00313             if (command == "GENERATE_MOLECULES") {
00314                DArray<double> ExclusionRadii;
00315                DArray<int>    capacities;
00316                ExclusionRadii.allocate(nAtomType());
00317                capacities.allocate(nSpecies());
00318 
00319                // Parse command
00320                inBuffer >> system().boundary();
00321                Log::file() << "  " << system().boundary();
00322                Label capacityLabel("Capacities:");
00323                inBuffer >> capacityLabel;
00324                for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00325                   inBuffer >> capacities[iSpecies];
00326                   Log::file() << "  " << capacities[iSpecies];
00327                }
00328                Label radiusLabel("Radii:");
00329                inBuffer >> radiusLabel;
00330                for (int iType=0; iType < nAtomType(); iType++) {
00331                   inBuffer >> ExclusionRadii[iType];
00332                   Log::file() << "  " << ExclusionRadii[iType];
00333                }
00334                Log::file() << std::endl;
00335 
00336                for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00337                   species(iSpecies).generateMolecules(
00338                      capacities[iSpecies], ExclusionRadii, system(),
00339                      &system().bondPotential(),
00340                      system().boundary());   
00341                }
00342 
00343                #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR 
00344                // Generate pair list
00345                system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00346                #endif
00347 
00348             } else
00349             #ifndef UTIL_MPI
00350             if (command == "SET_PAIR") {
00351                std::string paramName;
00352                int typeId1, typeId2; 
00353                double value;
00354                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId1 >> typeId2 >> value;
00355                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName 
00356                            << "  " <<  typeId1 << "  " <<  typeId2
00357                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00358                system().pairPotential()
00359                        .set(paramName, typeId1, typeId2, value);
00360             } else 
00361             if (command == "SET_BOND") {
00362                std::string paramName;
00363                int typeId; 
00364                double value;
00365                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00366                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00367                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00368                system().bondPotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00369             } else 
00370             #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00371             if (command == "SET_ANGLE") {
00372                std::string paramName;
00373                int typeId; 
00374                double value;
00375                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00376                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00377                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00378                system().anglePotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00379             } else 
00380             #endif
00381             #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00382             if (command == "SET_DIHEDRAL") {
00383                std::string paramName;
00384                int typeId; 
00385                double value;
00386                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00387                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00388                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00389                system().dihedralPotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00390             } else 
00391             #endif
00392             #endif
00393             {
00394                Log::file() << "Error: Unknown command  " << std::endl;
00395                readNext = false;
00396             }
00397 
00398          }
00399       }
00400    }

00402    /*
00403    * Read and implement commands from the default command file.
00404    */
00405    void MdSimulation::readCommands()
00406    {  readCommands(fileMaster().commandFile()); }
00407 
00408    /* 
00409    * Run a simulation.
00410    */
00411    void MdSimulation::simulate(int endStep, bool isContinuation)
00412    {
00413       Timer timer;
00414 
00415       if (isContinuation) {
00416          Log::file() << "Continuing simulation from iStep = " 
00417                      << iStep_ << std::endl;
00418       } else {
00419          iStep_ = 0;
00420          diagnosticManager().setup();
00421          system_.mdIntegrator().setup();
00422       }
00423       int beginStep = iStep_;
00424       int nStep = endStep - beginStep;
00425 
00426       // Main loop 
00427       Log::file() << std::endl;
00428       timer.start();
00429       for ( ; iStep_ < endStep; ++iStep_) {
00430 
00431          // Sample scheduled diagnostics
00432          if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00433             if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00434                system().shiftAtoms();
00435                diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00436             }
00437          }
00438 
00439          #ifdef INTER_NOPAIR
00440          else {
00441             // When the pair potential is disabled, require that
00442             // Diagnostic::baseInterval != 0 to guarantee periodic 
00443             // shifting of atomic positions into primary cell.
00444             UTIL_THROW("Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0 with no pair potential");
00445          }
00446          #endif
00447 
00448          // Take one MD step with the MdIntegrator
00449          system_.mdIntegrator().step();
00450 
00451       }
00452       timer.stop();
00453       double time  = timer.time();
00454       double rstep = double(nStep);
00455 
00456       // Shift final atomic positions 
00457       system().shiftAtoms();
00458 
00459       // Sample diagnostic for final configuration
00460       if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00461          if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00462             diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00463          }
00464       }
00465 
00466       // Final diagnostic output
00467       diagnosticManager().output();
00468 
00469       // Output timing results
00470       Log::file() << std::endl;
00471       Log::file() << "Time Statistics" << std::endl;
00472       Log::file() << "endStep              " << endStep << std::endl;
00473       Log::file() << "nStep                " << nStep   << std::endl;
00474       Log::file() << "run time             " 
00475                   << time << " sec" << std::endl;
00476       Log::file() << "time / nStep         " 
00477                   << time / rstep << " sec" << std::endl;
00478       Log::file() << "time / (nStep*nAtom) " 
00479                   <<  time / (rstep*double(system().nAtom())) 
00480                   << " sec" << std::endl;
00481       Log::file() << std::endl;
00482       Log::file() << std::endl;
00483 
00484       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00485       Log::file() << "PairList Statistics" << std::endl;
00486       Log::file() << "maxNPair           " 
00487                   << system().pairPotential().pairList().maxNPair()
00488                   << std::endl;
00489       Log::file() << "maxNAtom           " 
00490                   << system().pairPotential().pairList().maxNAtom()
00491                   << std::endl;
00492       int buildCounter = system().pairPotential().pairList().buildCounter();
00493       Log::file() << "buildCounter       " 
00494                   << buildCounter
00495                   << std::endl;
00496       Log::file() << "steps / build      " 
00497                   << rstep/double(buildCounter)
00498                   << std::endl;
00499       Log::file() << std::endl;
00500       #endif
00501 
00502    }
00503 
00504    /*
00505    * Read and analyze a sequence of configuration files.
00506    */
00507    void MdSimulation::analyzeDumps(int min, int max, std::string dumpPrefix)
00508    {
00509       // Preconditions
00510       if (min < 0)    UTIL_THROW("min < 0");
00511       if (max < min)  UTIL_THROW("max < min");
00512 
00513       Timer             timer;
00514       std::string       filename;
00515       std::stringstream indexString;
00516       std::ifstream     configFile;
00517       int               nConfig;
00518       nConfig = max - min + 1;
00519 
00520       // Main loop
00521       Log::file() << "begin main loop" << std::endl;
00522       timer.start();
00523       for (iStep_ = min; iStep_ <= max; ++iStep_) {
00524 
00525          indexString << iStep_;
00526          filename = dumpPrefix;
00527          filename += indexString.str();
00528          fileMaster().openInputFile(filename, configFile);
00529 
00530          // Clear the stringstream
00531          indexString.str("");
00532         
00533          system().readConfig(configFile);
00534          configFile.close();
00535 
00536          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00537          // Build the system CellList
00538          system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00539          #endif
00540 
00541          #ifndef NDEBUG
00542          isValid();
00543          #endif
00544 
00545          // Initialize diagnostics (taking in molecular information).
00546          if (iStep_ == min) diagnosticManager().setup();
00547 
00548          // Sample property values
00549          diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00550 
00551          // Clear out the System for the next readConfig.
00552          system().removeAllMolecules();
00553  
00554       }
00555       timer.stop();
00556       Log::file()<< "end main loop" << std::endl;
00557 
00558       // Output results of all diagnostics to output files
00559       diagnosticManager().output();
00560 
00561       // Output time 
00562       Log::file() << std::endl;
00563       Log::file() << "nConfig       " << nConfig << std::endl;
00564       Log::file() << "run time      " << timer.time() 
00565                   << "  sec" << std::endl;
00566       Log::file() << "time / config " << timer.time()/double(nConfig) 
00567                   << "  sec" << std::endl;
00568       Log::file() << std::endl;
00569 
00570    }
00571 
00572    /*
00573    * Read and analyze a trajectory file
00574    */
00575    void MdSimulation::analyzeTrajectory(int min, int max, std::string classname,
00576       std::string filename)
00577    {
00578       Timer             timer;
00579       std::stringstream indexString;
00580       std::fstream*     trajectoryFile;
00581       TrajectoryIo*     trajectoryIo;
00582       int nFrames; 
00583 
00584       // Obtain trajectoryIo objecct
00585       if (!(trajectoryIo = system().trajectoryIoFactory().factory(classname))) {
00586         std::string message;
00587         message="Invalid TrajectoryIo class name " + classname;
00588         UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00589       }
00590 
00591       Log::file() << "reading " << filename << std::endl;
00592 
00593       // Open trajectory file
00594       trajectoryFile = new std::fstream();
00595       trajectoryFile->open(filename.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00596 
00597       if (trajectoryFile->fail()) {
00598         std::string message;
00599         message= "Error opening trajectory file. Filename: " + filename;
00600         UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00601       }
00602 
00603       // read in information from trajectory file
00604       trajectoryIo->readHeader(*trajectoryFile);
00605 
00606       nFrames = trajectoryIo->nFrames();
00607 
00608       // Main loop
00609       Log::file() << "begin main loop" << std::endl;
00610       timer.start();
00611 
00612       // Allow for negative values of min, max (counted from the end)
00613       if (min < 0) min = nFrames+min;
00614       if (max < 0) max = nFrames+max;
00615 
00616       // Sanity checks
00617       if (min < 0 || min >= nFrames)  UTIL_THROW("min < 0 or min >= nFrames!");
00618       if (max < 0 || max >= nFrames)  UTIL_THROW("max < 0 or max >= nFrames!");
00619       if (max < min)  UTIL_THROW("max < min!");
00620 
00621       for (iStep_ = 0; iStep_ <= max; ++iStep_) {
00622 
00623          // Read frames, even if they are not sampled
00624          trajectoryIo->readFrame(*trajectoryFile);
00625 
00626          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00627          // Build the system CellList
00628          system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00629          #endif
00630 
00631          #ifndef NDEBUG
00632          isValid();
00633          #endif
00634 
00635          // Initialize diagnostics (taking in molecular information).
00636          if (iStep_ == min) diagnosticManager().setup();
00637 
00638          // Sample property values only for iStep >= min
00639          if (iStep_ >= min) diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00640 
00641       }
00642       timer.stop();
00643       Log::file() << "end main loop" << std::endl;
00644 
00645       // Close trajectory file
00646       trajectoryFile->close();
00647 
00648       // delete objects
00649       delete trajectoryIo;
00650       delete trajectoryFile;
00651 
00652       // Output results of all diagnostics to output files
00653       diagnosticManager().output();
00654 
00655       // Output time 
00656       Log::file() << std::endl;
00657       Log::file() << "nFrames       " << max-min+1 << std::endl;
00658       Log::file() << "run time      " << timer.time() 
00659                   << "  sec" << std::endl;
00660       Log::file() << "time / frame " << timer.time()/double(nFrames) 
00661                   << "  sec" << std::endl;
00662       Log::file() << std::endl;
00663 
00664    }
00665 
00666    void MdSimulation::writeRestart(const std::string& filename)
00667    {
00668       std::ofstream out;
00669       fileMaster().openParamOFile(filename, ".prm", out);
00670       writeParam(out);
00671       out << "iStep = " << iStep_; 
00672       out.close();
00673 
00674       fileMaster().openRestartOFile(filename, ".rst", out);
00675       Serializable::OArchiveType ar;
00676       ar.setStream(out);
00677 
00678       ar & random();
00679       //ar & system();
00680       system().save(ar);
00681       system().mdIntegrator().save(ar);
00682       ar & iStep_;
00683       mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_->save(ar);
00684       out.close();
00685    }
00686 
00687    void MdSimulation::readRestart(const std::string& filename)
00688    {
00689       // readRestart
00690       if (isInitialized_) {
00691          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readRestart when already initialized");
00692       }
00693       if (!isRestarting_) {
00694          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readRestart without restart option");
00695       }
00696 
00697       // Open and read parameter (*.prm) file
00698       std::ifstream in;
00699       fileMaster().openParamIFile(filename, ".prm", in);
00700       readParam(in);
00701       in.close();
00702 
00703       // Open restart *.rst file and associate with an archive
00704       fileMaster().openRestartIFile(filename, ".rst", in);
00705       Serializable::IArchiveType ar;
00706       ar.setStream(in);
00707 
00708       // Load internal state from restart (*.rst) file.
00709       ar & random();
00710       system().load(ar);
00711       system().mdIntegrator().load(ar);
00712       ar & iStep_;
00713       mdDiagnosticManagerPtr_->load(ar);
00714       in.close();
00715 
00716       // Read command (*.cmd) file
00717       std::string commandFileName = filename + ".cmd";
00718       fileMaster().setCommandFileName(commandFileName);
00719 
00720       isInitialized_ = true;
00721    }
00722 
00723    /* 
00724    * Return true if this MdSimulation is valid, or throw an Exception.
00725    */
00726    bool MdSimulation::isValid() const
00727    {
00728       Simulation::isValid();
00729       system_.isValid();
00730 
00731       if (&system_.simulation() != this) {
00732          UTIL_THROW("Invalid pointer to Simulation in System");
00733       }
00734 
00735       return true;
00736    }
00737 
00738 }
